name: Medieval Merriment
description:
W  A  S  D  ➵  Move thyself about
Space  ➵  Jump like a young hare!Hail and well met, dear minstrel! Thou hast a most fortuitous gig playing thy lovely tunes for the Queen this eve. But alas, thou hast arrived at the wrong establishment. Make haste and journey to the correct venue!
